phome.bidtracker.store

Class BidStoreLockFree

  • java.lang.Object
    • phome.bidtracker.store.BidStoreLockFree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BidStore

    public class BidStoreLockFree
extends Object
implements BidStore
    This is an implementation of a Concurrent Bid Store. ConcurrentHashMap and lock free (CAS based) algorithms are employed to handle following concurrency situations:
    1. Concurrent Updates to the BidStore for different items
    2. Concurrent Updates on the bid list for a given Item
    Ref: http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/library/j-jtp04186/

    Also uses Deque interface to store bids on a given item. Rationale:
    A bid will only make it to the store if and only if its the highest one at given point in time. Hence the bid is auto sorted by its order of insertion. In order to retrieve the winning bid the last bid placed has to be retrieved.
    Deque interface provides semantics for add() to the tail and retrieve from the Tail
    LIFO Stack would have been appropriate as well but in Java Standard Library its based on legacy implementation of Vector and hence not chosen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BidStoreLockFree()
      Instantiates the bid store with a CHM with concurrency level based on CPU cores available

    • Method Detail

      • maybeSave

        public boolean maybeSave(Bid bid)
        Attempts to save a bid given it is valid i.e. Higher than all other bids placed so far. If not the bid is rejected.
        Handles concurrent updates in iterative lock free way using replace and putIfAbsent contracts from ConcurrentMap interface. At least one thread is bound to make progress in event of conflict on updates on a given item.
        Hence the iteration is self converging. Also, every iteration checks if the bid is still valid which would mean in event of being outbid the loop will short circuit. In absence of any conflict the iteration will complete in the first go itself
        Specified by:
        maybeSave in interface BidStore

      • winningBid

        public Bid winningBid(String itemId)
        Returns the winning bid by retrieving the tail of the deque Null is returned in event of no bids
        Specified by:
        winningBid in interface BidStore
        Returns:
        - winningBid
        - null if no bids on the item

      • bidsForItem

        public Iterable<Bid> bidsForItem(String itemId)
